name: Falling Plus
description: Help Peppy the Penguin clean up the mess by quickly matching colors, but look out for Wally the Walrus! Falling Plus is a 1980s-esque arcade-style puzzle game, featuring sharp, colorful graphics and audio created on a Commodore 64!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo P8600, equivalent, or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 200 series, AMD Radeon HD 5000 series, Intel HD Graphics 4000, equivalent, or better Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360, DualShock4, Switch Pro, and Steam Controllers supported
